name: Delray Beach
description: Licensed Delray Beach electricians providing 24/7 expert services. From Atlantic Avenue commercial support to historic residential restorations, Solomon Electric is your trusted local choice.

challenges.title: Historic preservation & Modernization
challenges.description: Delray's charm lies in its history. Neighborhoods like Lake Ida require specialized electrical skills to safely modernize systems while respecting architectural heritage.

challenges.title: High-Density Commercial Support
challenges.description: The vibrancy of Atlantic Avenue requires electricians who can deliver fast, professional support for high-traffic retail, dining, and entertainment spaces.

challenges.title: Coastal Electrical Durability
challenges.description: Delray's coastal properties face salt air corrosion. We use marine-grade fixtures and specialized materials to ensure long-lasting outdoor power and lighting.

faqs.question: Do you provide electrical services for businesses on Atlantic Avenue?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer full commercial support for Delray's premier entertainment district, including emergency response, lighting design, and power upgrades.

faqs.question: Are your electricians familiar with Delray Beach historic codes?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We frequently work on historic properties in and around downtown, ensuring all work is code-compliant and respectfully integrated into the home's architecture.

seoContent.heading: Trusted Delray Beach Electricians – Village by the Sea
seoContent.body: Delray Beach is a city that perfectly balances its award-winning 'Village by the Sea' charm with a sophisticated, modern energy. From Pineapple Grove to the sands of Atlantic Avenue, it's a community that values quality and character. Solomon Electric is proud to deliver that same standard of excellence to our Delray neighbors.

seoContent.heading: Expert Electrical Solutions for Delray Residents and Businesses
seoContent.body: Whether you're restoring a historic gem in Lake Ida, upgrading a boutique on Atlantic Ave, or needing urgent help near the beach, our licensed team is ready. We provide upfront pricing, clean workmanship, and a dedication to safety that Delray Beach has trusted for over 15 years.
